concept.description: Labels all types annotated with "org.springframework.stereotype.Service" with "Spring", "Service" and "Component".
concept.cypher: MATCH (service:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn = "org.springframework.stereotype.Service" SET service:Spring:Service:Component RETURN service as Service

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with "org.springframework.stereotype.Controller" with "Spring", "Controller" and "Component".
concept.cypher: MATCH (controller:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn = "org.springframework.stereotype.Controller" SET controller:Spring:Controller:Component RETURN controller as Controller
